content: Welcome to your new project! I can help you edit it however you want. What would you like to do?
I want in the footer you genreate a sc frontend interaction 0x3abc4764f0237923d52056cfba7e9aebf87113d3 in ethereum

function.arguments: {"component_id":"Footer1732186605","sc_address":"0x3abc4764f0237923d52056cfba7e9aebf87113d3","chain_id":"ETHEREUM","change_description":"generate a smart contract frontend interaction","acknowledgement_message":"Okay, I'm editing the footer component to interact with the smart contract at 0x3abc4764f0237923d52056cfba7e9aebf87113d3 on Ethereum."}
function.name: EditSmartContractFrontendComponent

content: Okay, I'm editing the footer component to interact with the smart contract at 0x3abc4764f0237923d52056cfba7e9aebf87113d3 on Ethereum.

Success: 
I have successfully generated a new component for interacting with the LidoLocator smart contract. This component, named LidoLocatorInteraction, allows users to connect their wallet and call all the view functions available in the contract.

Key features of the component:
1. Wallet connection and chain checking functionality
2. Buttons for each contract method
3. Display of results for each method call
4. Error handling for failed calls
5. Responsive layout using Tailwind CSS

Please note that this component assumes the user has MetaMask or a similar Web3 wallet installed in their browser. If the user doesn't have a compatible wallet, they will see an error message in the console.

Also, remember that this component only interacts with view functions, which don't require gas fees or transaction signing. If you need to interact with state-changing functions in the future, additional handling for transactions would be required.
